DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of KLS-0611 compared to placebo in patients with dry eye syndromes.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study of KLS-0611 in Patients With Dry Eye Syndromes
DOC.criteria: Corneal and conjunctival damage Insufficiency of lacrimal secretion Ocular symptom Severe ophthalmic disorder Punctual plugs or surgery for occlusion of the lacrimal puncta
